Name: Lambs on the road : The beginning
About the game: Lambs on the Road From the creators of Eternum EX, in collaboration with Gone Mad studio. Lambs on the road is a survival horror story of a father looking for her daughter. Help John to find her daughter, Mary, throught different dangers, lost in a post-apocalyptic world where the chaos reigns. Try to escape from the starving and desperate people, hide, run, fight and overall, never look back. Features: - A short heartbreaking story that will hold your heart in a fist - A personal journey of learning how to survive - A tale filled with horror and desperation - Colorful art to accompany your journey - A nice combination between platformer and adventure game
